page.title: 17A North Shropshire Ramble
page.content: We walked Southwards to a T-junction and turned right passing two farms.The Meadows and Greystones.We came to a grey gate which was set back off the road and on to a dirt track.We walked passed four large oak trees and came to a field growing barley which was about four feet tall.We walked along a path at the side of the field and came to a field of cows.The next field was growing grass.We walked through it and turned right into a large field which had a herd of cattle in it.We walked down towards a fence which we climbed over into another field of barley which was about three feet tall.The ground was surprisingly very boggy.
